# DeepLabelNet

**DeepLabelNet** is a Jupyter-like image annotation tool built with Django. It provides an intuitive web-based interface to manually draw, label, and manage bounding boxes on images â€” ideal for computer vision datasets, especially for object detection tasks such as traffic sign detection.

![DeepLabelNet Interface](https://your-image-link-if-any)

- ğŸ” User authentication and dashboard interface
- âš¡ Built with Django, OpenCV, Torch, and Ultralytics
